description: The newspapers, uncovered in the Mont Blanc glacier, report the landmark election of Indira Gandhi.
title: Indian papers resurfacing in French Alps could be from 1966 plane crash
title_page: Indian papers resurfacing in French Alps could be from 1966 plane crash - BBC News
maintext: She held the post twice. Her first term lasted 11 years but after a turbulent two-year state of emergency from 1975 to 1977 she called an election to vindicate her position - a move that resulted in her losing her seat.
